findings.rationale: A duration of five years may not be sufficient for certain types of confidential information, especially in rapidly evolving industries.
findings.evidence_quote: This Agreement shall remain in effect for a period of five (5) years from the date of execution.

findings.rationale: The emphasis on injunctive relief without the requirement for posting bond may expose the parties to unfair situations where one party could seek immediate relief without proper justification.
findings.evidence_quote: the Disclosing Party shall be entitled to seek injunctive relief without posting bond or other security.

findings.rationale: Restrictions on assignment may hinder business flexibility and limit the parties' ability to adapt to changes in control or ownership.
findings.evidence_quote: Neither party may assign this Agreement without the prior written consent of the other party.
